scripts.font: mkdir -p dist/fonts && find node_modules/font-awesome/fonts -iname 'fontawesome*' -exec cp -v \{\} dist/fonts/ \;
scripts.copy: cp CNAME dist/ && npm run font && npm run lib
scripts.css: node-sass sass/main.scss | postcss -u autoprefixer | csso -o dist/css/main.css
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run css && npm run js && npm run tobiko
scripts.deploy: npm run build && gh-pages -d dist -b master -r git@github.com:tnguyen14/tnguyen14.github.io.git
scripts.dev: npm run js:watch & npm run css:watch & npm run tobiko -- -w
